review: Purchased game on sale. Installed game. Hit play, PC completely shut down. OK, rebooted it. Verifiyed game, run game, click play, PC shut down. Uninstall, request for a refund. I'm not one to take any game that shuts down my PC automatically. Valuble data can be lost that way and it can screw up my system. I have more than the required specs to run this game, with ease. The developers have already stated that this game is of no priority to them so, that speaks for itself.
